pages.text: The $(major)Scraper/$ is used to get $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/organic_matter)Organic Matter/$ from mobs.$(br2)To use it, simply right-click the mob. This damages the mob, which counts as an attack and will anger neutral entities.
Scrapers can be enchanted with $(minor)Delicate Touch/$, which prevents damaging and angering entities.
